Package pt.up.fe.pe25.task.notification.plugins

Class PluginDecorator

java.lang.Object
pt.up.fe.pe25.task.notification.plugins.PluginDecorator
All Implemented Interfaces:
NotificationService
Direct Known Subclasses:
MailPlugin, MsTeamsPlugin, SmsPlugin, TwilioCallPlugin, TwilioSMSPlugin, WhatsAppPlugin
public abstract class PluginDecorator extends Object implements NotificationService
A plugin decorator
It is used to decorate a notification service with additional functionality
It is used in the MailPlugin to send notifications by email
It is used in the MsTeamsPlugin to send notifications by webhook in ms teams
It is used in the WhatsAppPlugin to send notifications by whatsapp
It is used in the TwilioSMSPlugin to send notifications by sms
It is used in the TwilioCallPlugin to send notifications by voice
It is used in the SmsPlugin to send notifications by sms using a smpp server
See Also:

    • sendRequest

      public org.json.JSONObject sendRequest(String urlString, String requestBody, String httpMethod, Map<String,String> headers)
      Sends an HTTP request to the specified URL with the given request body, HTTP method, and headers.
      Parameters:
      urlString - the URL to send the request to
      requestBody - the request body to send (can be null if not applicable)
      httpMethod - the HTTP method to use (e.g. "GET", "POST", etc.)
      headers - a map of headers to include in the request (can be null if not applicable)
      Returns:
      a JSONObject representing the response from the server
